column4: could someone suggest to me a decent cd player app for a minimal system? i have not been able to find much of anything.
soundjuicer - plays and rips, does nothing else. Much nicer than Rythmbox's mess, IMO.
ok, i may try sound-juicer... i had not tried it, as this old machine has no burner... but if it plays CDs well, that may be the way to go.
sj isn't a burner, just a CD ripper and player
